title: Computational Thinking Development Course Through Data-Driven Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis concepts and experience with Excel or spreadsheet tools
context.additional_context: Data-driven problem-solving strategies applicable to elementary math classrooms and computational thinking enhancement for in-service elementary teachers

learning_goals: The procedure for solving real-world educational problems through a data collection-analysis-interpretation process can be explained
Spreadsheet tools can be utilized to visualize educational datasets and derive patterns
Collaborating with peer teachers, data-driven problem-solving scenarios can be designed and feedback incorporated
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
